name: Agents, including corporations
text:
The corporation may exercise any or all of the powers conferred upon it, either generally or with respect to any specific housing project through an agent that it may designate, including any corporation that is formed under the laws of this State, and for such purposes the corporation may cause one or more corporations to be formed under the laws of this State or may acquire the capital stock of any corporation.  Any corporate agent, all of the stock of which shall be owned by the corporation or its nominee, may to the extent permitted by law, exercise any of the powers conferred upon the corporation herein. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2]
    [Section effective July 1, 2006.  For section effective until June 30, 2006, see above.]  The administration may exercise any or all of the powers conferred upon it, either generally or with respect to any specific housing project through an agent that it may designate, including any corporation that is formed under the laws of this State, and for such purposes the administration may cause one or more corporations to be formed under the laws of this State or may acquire the capital stock of any corporation.  Any corporate agent, all of the stock of which shall be owned by the administration or its nominee, may to the extent permitted by law, exercise any of the powers conferred upon the administration herein. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2; am L 2005, c 196, §26(a)]
